parameters.name: BreakType
parameters.description: Type of break as defined in swBreakCornerTypes_e

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Type of relief: 0 = circular 1 = square 2 = bend-waist

parameters.name: Param
parameters.description: ReliefType dependent: circular, its diameter square, its side length bend-waist, its radius

title: IFeatureManager.InsertSheetMetalCornerTrim
description: Inserts a break corner trim in the sheet metal part.
signature:
Feature InsertSheetMetalCornerTrim( 
   System.Int32
InternalCornerFlag
,
   System.Int32
BreakType
,
   System.Double
BreakDist
,
   System.Int32
ReliefType
,
   System.Double
Param
)

parameters.name: BreakType
parameters.description: Type of break as defined in swBreakCornerTypes_e

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Type of relief: 0 = circular 1 = square 2 = bend-waist

parameters.name: Param
parameters.description: ReliefType dependent: circular, its diameter square, its side length bend-waist, its radius

returns: Pointer to the break corner trim feature in the sheet metal part
